description: Route defines a node in the routing tree.

active_time_intervals.description: ActiveTimeIntervals Times when the route should be active These must match the name at time_intervals

continue.description: Continue indicating whether an alert should continue matching subsequent sibling nodes. It will always be true for the first-level route if disableRouteContinueEnforce for vmalertmanager not set.

group_by.description: List of labels to group by.

group_interval.description: How long to wait before sending an updated notification.

group_wait.description: How long to wait before sending the initial notification.

matchers.description: List of matchers that the alert’s labels should match. For the first level route, the operator adds a namespace: "CRD_NS" matcher. https://prometheus.io/docs/alerting/latest/configuration/#matcher

mute_time_intervals.description: MuteTimeIntervals is a list of interval names that will mute matched alert

receiver.description: Name of the receiver for this route.

repeat_interval.description: How long to wait before repeating the last notification.
